title: Club Internacional de Foot-ball
text: Club Internacional de Foot-ball is a sports club founded in 1902, from <a href="Lisbon">Lisbon</a>, Portugal. By 1924 the club decided to end its <a href="association%20football">football</a> team claiming the sport's amateurism ideals were being lost. Since then the club's main focus are <a href="basketball">basketball</a>, youth football and <a href="tennis">tennis</a>.
